title: Advertise a job using Employer Direct online

details.description: How you can use Employer Direct online to advertise jobs on Jobcentre Plus, change jobs that you've posted and view jobs that you have previously posted
details.more_information:
You don’t need to register to use this service but if you register you can:

  • manage your jobs with Jobcentre Plus
  • view your jobs (up to a maximum of 500) for 12 months after you have posted them
  • change, re-advertise or stop advertising a job

Call the helpline for:

  • technical problems
  • recruitment information and advice
  • help writing your job vacancy
